org.rapla.mobile.android.activity

Class AllocatableDetailsActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • org.rapla.mobile.android.activity.BaseActivity
        • org.rapla.mobile.android.activity.AllocatableDetailsActivity

  • public class AllocatableDetailsActivity
extends BaseActivity
    The allocatable details screen allows the user to book an allocatable of the previously selected allocatable category. A booked allocatable can be assigned to any number of appointments.
    Author:
    Maximilian Lenkeit

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AllocatableDetailsActivity.AllocatableAssignAppointmentsDialogListener
      This class handles the dialog for assigning appointments to an allocatable.

      AllocatableUndoBookingDialogListener This class handles the dialog started from the context menu for undoing booking an allocatable
      class  AllocatableDetailsActivity.SelectedAllocatableActionHandler
      SelectedAllocatableActionHandler This class handles all actions related to an allocatable selected from the list view.

      • getListAdapter

        public AllocatableAdapter getListAdapter()
        The list adapter cannot be kept as an instance attribute as for some reason, as soon as passing the reference to the async task for loading allocatables, the reference gets lost. So always retrieve it on the fly from the list view.
        Returns:
        Casted list adapter of list view
